channel.title: DeFi Impact on FinanClub
channel.description: Recent content in DeFi Impact on FinanClub

item.title: COIN
item.description: score:-38 Chances: Coinbase Global has achieved a significant milestone by winning approval to handle customers’ buying and selling of crypto futures. As a major player in cryptocurrency trading, Coinbase Global benefits from the $900 billion spot trading market of cryptocurrencies. The popularity of decentralized finance (DeFi) and Ethereum’s leadership in the space could positively impact Coinbase’s position in the crypto market.
